named-native-query.name: Litige.allLitigeLigneForfait
named-native-query.query: SELECT ll.lil_ref, ol.art_ref, ll.cli_pu, ll.cli_qte, ll.cli_bta_code, o.dev_code AS cli_dev_code, ll.res_dev_pu, ll.res_pu, ll.res_bta_code, ll.res_qte, ll.res_dev_taux, ll.res_dev_code FROM GEO_LITLIG ll, GEO_LITIGE l, GEO_ORDRE o, GEO_ORDLIG ol WHERE l.lit_ref = :arg_lit_ref AND ll.LIT_REF = l.LIT_REF AND l.ORD_REF_ORIGINE = o.ORD_REF AND ol.ORL_REF = ll.ORL_REF
